Name: Miramare Beach
Description: This pleasant hotel is situated just outside of Side, only five kilometres from the old town centre and beautiful Roman ruins, including a Temple of Apollo and amphitheatre.  A long stretch of sandy beach dotted with sun loungers and parasols is just steps from the hotel, and guests can spend lazy afternoons lounging in the sun by the outdoor pool, which features three waterslides and a separate children's pool.  The onsite spa offers rest and relaxation with its services including massages, Turkish bath, and sauna, while the kids' club provides entertainment for children ages 4 to 12 as well as a ‘mini-disco' in the evenings.  The hotel also offers an animation programme and volleyball, tennis and basketball courts for guest leisure.  Whether visiting Side for a fun-filled family holiday or a couple's relaxing weekend away, this hotel provides all the services and facilities needs to enjoy a carefree stay.
